com.ipt.ebsa.agnostic.client.skyscape.module

Class VMModule

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ipt.ebsa.agnostic.client.skyscape.module.VMModule

  • public class VMModule
extends Object
    Provides generally useful, stateless method calls for working with VMs

      • updateCPUs

        private void updateCPUs(com.vmware.vcloud.sdk.VM vm,
              Integer numberOfCPUs)
                 throws com.vmware.vcloud.sdk.VCloudException
        Updates the number of CPUs in the virtual machine if the number of CPUs is not already correct. It does nothing if the number of CPUs is already correct.
        Parameters:
        vm -
        numberOfCPUs -
        Throws:

      • updateDisks

        private void updateDisks(com.vmware.vcloud.sdk.VM vm,
               DiskDetail[] diskDetails)
                  throws com.vmware.vcloud.sdk.VCloudException
        Reconcile disks currently in the virtual machine with what is in the configuration which is being applied. NOTE: vm.getDisks(); returns the disk and its associated controllers. We need to do a check to see if we are looking at a disk before we try and update the disk size. If this code removes a disk it leaves the controllers there. TBD if this is the right policy
        Parameters:
        vm -
        diskDetails -
        Throws:
        com.vmware.vcloud.sdk.VCloudException
